Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: BIG ANNOUNCEMENT! OUR EXCHANGE WILL NOW BECOME X-HIVE   We are happy to announce that Cryptech works, LTD. have acquired the operations of the BEXAM exchange and with this, the name will officially change to X-HIVE and be operated on x-hive.io.  The exchange will still be operated using the same amazing technology that powers the Bexam platform and allows for incredible speed and scalability, however it will now have a new look and location and be operated by Cryptech works, Ltd.  We have published a Medium article with the details of this change.  To read the article please click the MEDIUM LINK HERE or click the image below.   As we are aware, there may be some questions regarding this change.  If anyone has any questions for us, please feel free to ask us anything that is on your mind in our TELEGRAM GROUP.

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: THE BEXAM TICKER HAS OFFICIALLY CHANGED  Our new token ticker will be..... BEXAM  We had a vote and our community decided on the ticker, because what could be easier for our ticker than the name of our company?  If anyone is curious as to why this change was needed please check out our Medium article by clicking on the image below.

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: GREAT NEWS!!  As you know, Bexam's exchange has been under new operations from last month and was renamed X-Hive.  Today, the beta of the X-Hive wallet app for windows and mac was made available for download on x-hive.io. Please try it out! You can trade real cryptocurrency pairs* now and test Bexam's speed for yourself!  *Please be aware, since it is still the beta, unfortunately, there is no guarantee for the assets you deposit into the exchange from external sources, so please don't put your whole fortune into X-Hive (yetüòâ).  For more information, please head over to the X-Hive Telegram channel (https://t.me/XHive_community_group) and feel free to bother the X-Hive team there with all your questions!  We wish X-Hive and it's team great success for the beta!! üëç  Thank you!

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: Hello,  Bexam is still going strong. Our developers are continuing to develop the technology. The X-Hive exchange is nearing completion and will be opening in the near future.  As the exchange is now operated by another entity that will be doing the IEO, we are focusing on refining the technology while connecting with businesses to create real use cases.

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: We actually started this project upon acquiring funding for this project and are actively seeking partnerships with companies as we speak.  We are also planning an IEO, but we want to make sure that our platform is up and running without any issues before we do this.   As far as the bounty, we are going to announce that in the near future so please stay tuned.

Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS

To read it, check it out here : Forbes Article     We're also now brainstorming to see what would be the best types of bounty programs to do for our community. We've got a few lined up that we will be releasing soon.  We also got to test our wallet Alpha build and gave some feedback to the engineers.  We will be making a few small changes and we are still planning on opening it up for Alpha public testing this month.

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: OFFICIAL ANNOUNCEMENT  Yesterday a FAKE ACCOUNT was created impersonating us on Twitter. This FAKE account was saying that they had started an airdrop and were selling BXA so they were requesting people's etherem wallet addresses.  We will ONLY make announcements through our official channels which are posted on this thread as well as linked on our official site BEXAM.IO  The FAKE ACCOUNT goes by the username @BEXAM_io .    The OFFICIAL ACCOUNT username is @BEXAM_official .  We hope that everyone stays vigilant as there are unfortunately scammers everywhere in this industry.    I'll post a screenshot of the SCAMMERS for reference.  UPDATE: This twitter account has been suspended.  Please continue to make sure all accounts are the official accounts before you give out any information in the future, not just for our project, but this applies to all projects.

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: The BEXAM Alpha Wallet has come to an end  We released our Alpha build wallet for testing a few weeks ago and during the process we were able to get quite a bit of feedback from the community.  We have sent the information back to our developers, which they will then take this info and make the changes to the wallet interface as well as the back-end operations of the system that were brought up.  We would like to thank all of those that participated in this phase of our testing.

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: We are focusing now on building a stable platform and proving its capabilities which is why we have been delaying the IEO.  We not only want enterprises and developers to know that the platform works, but also the people that want to participate in the IEO. We want to be able to clearly show the value in the project.  Also, we have to work in tandem with the devs to schedule the IEO as the tokens will be released on our exchange, which is nearly done, but still has a few things that need to be completed to be released to the public.    We're sorry for the delays, and we will absolutely notify everyone as soon as we have a concrete date for the IEO.

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: HELP US DECIDE OUR NEW TOKEN TICKER  We will be changing the token ticker of the BEXAM token from BXA to something new.   The reason why this is happening is because we had originally intended to release the token last year, which at that time BEXAM was the only company using the BXA ticker.  However, since time has passed another big name company, which many of you may be aware of, has taken it upon themselves to use the ticker as their own.   In order to avoid confusion we have graciously decided to allow them to use the ticker and we will be changing ours.   We have opened up a poll on twitter where we are asking the community to help us decide what our token ticker will be.  Please come join us on twitter and make your voices heard!  The twitter poll is located here ---> https://twitter.com/BEXAM_official/status/1093445013248172032

Author: turingox
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: What kind of test did your blockchain undergo before launching it? Can you be sure of all the claims regarding it's vulnerabilities, performance, etc.?

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: Right now we are still pre-launch so we are still undergoing testing and will soon be undergoing our security testing.  Hacken (https://hacken.io/) are our advisors that will be doing full testing of our network security prior to launch.  We fully trust that Hacken's white hat hackers will do a thorough job checking for any vulnerabilities in our platform.   For Performance we now have 2 video to show and will have much more in the near future.  The videos are quite rough and may be hard to understand, but the descriptions on the videos may clarify some things.   The following video shows a test of 3 Master Nodes and 5 Normal Nodes and their TPS achievements (each running on a 3GHz quad-core system with 16 GB RAM system).  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZwsYMIPPnvg  The next video shows a transaction using the BEXAM wallet on our platform.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Kh5rpFH5qc  We are constantly undergoing improvements and testing, especially since we are still pre-launch.

Author: JuggSlash
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: I'm sincerely don't know what TPS is, can you explain in full what is TPS? However, do you wish to make a bounty campaign?

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: We are planning to do a bounty campaign soon, once we have more information on this we'll announce it here, so stay tuned!  TPS is Transactions Per Second.  This refers to the amount of transactions which can be completed in 1 second.  This is a key factor to the scalability of blockchain, and especially important for high transaction implementations of the technology.   For more info you can read this article: Transactions per second TPS

Body: Our private sale is currently ongoing and is for the purchase of Super/Master Nodes, with 15-20% bonuses available in conjunction with node ownership. Our public sale, to be announced at a later date, will offer contributors a 10% bonus of tokens.

Author: BEXAM_official
Title: [ANN] |BEXAM| Revolutionary Blockchain/DAG platform with up to 40 Million TPS
Body: Hello Everyone,  A little update here, our engineers have run a test of our Proof of Rounds system to show what our Master Nodes are able to approve per second.    In the test we were able to achieve on average between 83,000 to 93,000 transactions per second.    We were running all the nodes on 3Ghz quad-core processors with 16GBs of ram each.   Check out the video of the test below.     We'd like to hear what you all think of this, so let us know!
